name: Back on Track
description:
Sometimes life gets in the way. 

Small things like personal hygiene or cooking a real meal feels like climbing up an obstacle riddled tower. But it doesn't matter how many times you have to try, getting that shower and that nice plate of pasta is enough to get you back on track and make you realize what you have lost: health, happiness and friends that love you. 

You were missing out on a lot, pal!

The team:

Martina Raico - Game Designer (https://martinaraico.wordpress.com/)

Paolo Borsellino - Level Designer (https://paoloborsellino.wordpress.com/)

Helena Turri - Concept artist (Backgrounds, platforms, props, menu buttons)

Sofia Carlotta Smiderle - Illustrator (cutscenes)

Anna Xiccato - Animator (https://instagram.com/xiccque?igshid=12prfzhnq4hk3)
